0.text: Innate: Braum's basic attacks and  Winter's Bite each apply a Concussive Blows stack to their target for 4 seconds, stacking up to 4 times, refreshing with each application. Once the first stack has been applied, any allied champion's basic attack  on-hit applies an additional stack to the target.

1.text: Upon reaching 4 stacks on a target, Concussive Blows is consumed to deal 26 − 196 (based on level) magic damage and  stun them for 1.25 − 1.75 (based on level) seconds.

2.text: This effect cannot apply to the same target more than once every few seconds. During this immunity period, affected targets take「 20% of the trigger damage as bonus magic damage 」「 5.2 − 39.2 (based on level) bonus magic damage 」from Braum's basic attacks.

0.text: Active: Braum propels ice from his shield in the target direction, dealing magic damage to the first enemy hit and  slowing them by 70% decaying over 2 seconds.

Active: Braum  dashes to put himself between the target ally and the closest  visible enemy  champion within 1500 units, and upon arrival grants himself and the ally  bonus armor and  bonus magic resistance for 3 seconds.

1.text: Stand Behind Me can be self cast to instantly grant Braum the bonus resistances.

2.text: Unbreakable can be cast while  dashing.

0.text: Active: Braum sets his shield in the target direction for a few seconds, creating a barrier that intercepts all incoming hostile non- turret  projectiles and  reduces the damage Braum takes through it. The first instance of damage dealt by a  champion from this direction is reduced by 100%.

1.text: While his shield is raised, Braum also gains  10% bonus movement speed and  ghosting.

0.text: Active: Braum leaps into the air and slams his shield into the ground, creating a fissure that travels in the target direction, dealing magic damage to enemies within its path as well as those around Braum.

1.text: The first target hit is  knocked up for at least 0.3 seconds, increased if they are further away from Braum. All other enemies hit are  knocked up for 0.3 seconds.

2.text: A field of ice is created along the fissure's path, lasting for 4 seconds and  slowing enemies within the area every 0.25 seconds. The field disappears after the duration ends in the same order and speed it was created with.

Unique – Trinket: Consume a charge to place an invisible Totem Ward at the target location, which reveals the surrounding area for 90 − 120 (based on average of all champion levels) seconds (240 − 120 (based on average of all champion levels) seconds recharge time; 2 charges; 600 range).

+30 health
+25% base health regeneration
+ 2 per 10 seconds

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Spoils of War: Grants a charge every 35 seconds, up to 3 charges. Basic attacks can consume a charge to execute minions. Basic attacks execute minions below ( 50% / 30%) of their maximum health. Killing a minion by any means with a charge grants you and the nearest allied champion kill gold. These effects require an allied champion to be nearby. Receive diminishing gold from excessive minion kills.
Unique – Quest: Earn 500 using this item to upgrade to Runesteel Spaulders, gaining the Warding active with 3 wards in stock.
passive.originText: UNIQUE – SPOILS OF WAR: Grants a charge every 35 seconds, up to 3 charges. Basic attacks can consume a charge to execute minions. These effects require an allied champion to be nearby. Receive diminishing gold from excessive minion kills.

active.originHTML:
Active

Unique – Conduit: Designate an allied champion as the Accomplice, forming a tether between you and them. Champions can only be designated as the Accomplice by one Zeke's Convergence at a time (60 second cooldown).
active.originText: UNIQUE – CONDUIT: Designate an allied champion as the Accomplice, forming a  tether between you and them. Champions can only be designated as the Accomplice by one Zeke's Convergence at a time (60 second cooldown).

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Convergence: Immobilizing enemy champions marks them for 8 seconds. Your Accomplice's basic attacks on-hit and ability hits against marked enemies deal 30 − 70 (based on level) (+ 7.5% AP) (+ 1.5% maximum health) bonus magic damage.
passive.originText: UNIQUE – CONVERGENCE:  Immobilizing enemy champions marks them for 8 seconds. Your Accomplice's basic attacks on-hit and ability hits against marked enemies deal 30 − 70 (based on level) (+ 7.5% AP) (+ 1.5% maximum health) bonus magic damage.

active.originHTML:
Active

Unique – Pledge: Designate an allied champion as Worthy, forming a tether between you and them. Champions can only be designated as Worthy by one Knight's Vow at a time (60 second cooldown).
active.originText: UNIQUE – PLEDGE: Designate an allied champion as Worthy, forming a  tether between you and them. Champions can only be designated as Worthy by one Knight's Vow at a time (60 second cooldown).

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Sacrifice: While your Worthy ally is nearby, redirect 15% of the post-mitigation physical and magic damage they take to you as true damage (stops if you are below 30% of your maximum health). Additionally, if they are below 50% of their maximum health, gain 35% bonus movement speed while moving towards them.
passive.originText: UNIQUE – SACRIFICE: While your Worthy ally is nearby, redirect 15% of the post-mitigation physical and magic damage they take to you as  true damage (stops if you are below 30% of your maximum health). Additionally, if they are below 50% of their maximum health, gain 35% bonus movement speed while moving towards them.
